data.summary_suggestion: Create a new spotset for a Smartspot device
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new spotset definition for a Smartspot device. Spotsets are stored locally on the Smartspot and synced with the server. The request body should contain the spotset configuration. Returns the created spotset object with a unique identifier. The spotset will be automatically synced to the associated Smartspot device.
